value.title: Remove or Unpublish “Publish to Web” Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this video, we will talk the procedure of removing a Power BI report after it has been publishing to web and anonymously accessed on web. value.title: Search bar in Power BI Desktop

value.title: Show/Hide Multiple Data Values using TME AG Toggle Switch – Custom Visual – Toggle Switch by TME AG
value.excerpt: During this session, we will explore one of the custom visuals in Power BI which is TME AG Toggle Switch in Power BI. value.title: What is Power BI Shared Datasets? How to user to develop Multiple Reports using Single Dataset?
